channel.title: Server Help please
channel.description: Hi there. I've started my own server and now want to make it into a good server before I advertise it. I've set this server up to help my children and I've never played MoparScape myself and know nothing about it. I'm using TestScape. I don't really understand about source codes so need all the help I can get. I need it explaining in Basic english please as I'm not that good with this kind of stuff. My children have logged into my server with no problems so at least I've got that bit right. Many thanks and I look forward to your replies :)

item.title: Server Help please
item.dc:creator: @pkedpker pkedpker
item.description:
@pkedpker wrote:

well basic stuff is that

.java files are source code files you can edit those in notepad most likely searching this forum for tutorials on what you need to your server.

.class files are the source code files compiled made so java.exe can read them you cant edit these files at all.

compile.bat if it exists that makes all .java into .class
runserver.bat runs java.exe which runs .class files.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help please
